policy.guidance: Use these workflows before writing bespoke AnkiConnect calls. Only use raw AnkiConnect for unsupported operations.

tools.description: Parse a PDF and create/update an Anki deck with extracted vocabulary.
Generate TTS pronunciation audio for deck cards lacking sound.
Generate mnemonic images for deck cards via prompt-managed gating.
Import explicit Front/Back card pairs from JSON into an Anki deck.
tools.invoke: python scripts/agent_tools.py cards-import --deck <deck_name> --input <pairs.json> [--front-key Front --back-key Back] [--note-model Basic] [--dry-run]

tools.description: List local-only reference PDFs kept outside git tracking.
Extract text from a specific page of a local reference PDF.
Run the local Flask UI for sync/audio/images/gallery workflows.
